popt4jlib.LIP

Class AdditiveSolver3

  • java.lang.Object
    • popt4jlib.LIP.AdditiveSolver2
      • popt4jlib.LIP.AdditiveSolver3
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AdditiveSolver3
extends AdditiveSolver2
    subclass of the AdditiveSolver2 class, that performs variable branching selection by choosing the free variable with the highest absolute value for its cost-coefficient.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2017

    • Method Detail

      • selectVariable

        protected int selectVariable(AdditiveSolver2.Node current)
        Description copied from class: AdditiveSolver2
        protected method used to select a free variable given an open node. Current method chooses the free variable that setting to 1 provides the least "infeasibility" in the program, i.e. it's a greedy method.
        Overrides:
        selectVariable in class AdditiveSolver2
        Returns:
        int the index of the chosen variable (in [0,num_vars-1))
